description: Guernsey's Education Committee is accused of failing to follow pledges to review secondary reforms.
title: Guernsey education review requirements 'ignored'
title_page: Guernsey education review requirements 'ignored' - BBC News
maintext: Responding to the claims, Deputy Matt Falaize, president of the Committee for Education, Sport and Culture, said: "Late on Wednesday, an instance was identified where staff had not paused an order for PE kit which arguably should have been paused.
